article_title: The long shot: Democrat Roger Kittelson enters CD2 race with focus on trade, single-payer health care

article_metadata.description: Roger KittelsonThe two-woman race for the DFL nomination in the Second Congressional District is now — at least officially — a three-person contest. This week, Roger Kittelson, a 59-year-old dairy industry professional from Goodhue, launched his bid for Congress.

og.description: Roger Kittelson says his late entry into the race is no problem, and that he’ll run a grass-roots, volunteer-based campaign focusing on the issues he cares about most.
og.title: The long shot: Democrat Roger Kittelson enters CD2 race with focus on trade, single-payer health care
